General_Description: '''Bounty on an Athenian Soldier ''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description:
Kassandra noticed a bounty for an [[Athens|Athenian]] [[soldier]] on a [[message board]]:
#"I compete with [[Wolf|wolves]] and [[bear]]s for game in my woods. I don't have time for this Athenian who thinks he knows which end of his [[spear]] is sharp. [[Hunting|Hunt]] him."
#"One of my soldiers is useless, but his family is influential. I can't deal with him openly so I need him to have a bad run-in with a [[mercenary]]."
#"The Athenian who ordered my brave son killed to cover up his own mistakes. Give him to the [[crow]]s."
#"The bastard Athenian thinks he can take whatever he wants from the poor. Well I can afford a bounty. Take from him.''(sic)''"
#"We invited a soldier into our home when he was traveling, and he repaid our hospitality by stealing from us! Kill that ungracious bastard."
Section_Outcome: Kassandra accepted the contract, and hunted down the Athenian soldier, claiming the bounty.
Section_Behind_the_scenes: The bounty flavor texts are not bound to any single region or city.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
